mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 3-3, northwest wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: East, Grace Marie [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A comment equating Kanye West with Nelson Mandela, with a format that seems reminiscent of the social media site Reddit, where a little number flanked by arrows pointing up and down allow users to vote a post up or down (I think), where this comment has earned an up vote of 1, to which someone else responds accusing writer of the Kanye West graffiti of voting their own graffiti/"post" up. Declaration of love. Quote of unknown source attributed to Brown. Unattributed quote ("Glass Cage of Emotion) from film Anchorman, starring Will Ferrell. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Kanye West = New Nelson Mandela ꜛ1ꜜ | ↑ upped your own post | Abby ♥ Chris | I own this shack. -Brown | I'm trapped in a Glass Cage of Emotion!!
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Social media
Politics
Mandela, Nelson, 1918-2013
